reviewText: This DVD is both informative and comprehensive.  With over 3 hours of narrative and demonstration, it is a thorough presentation of all aspects of teaching and practicing the Butterfly stroke for young swimmers and their coaches.  The video is aimed at the younger swimmer who is trying to improve to a higher level of proficiency and gives coaches many ideas and drills to help the swimmer achieve that goal.  Overall, it is a fine aide for coaches who are working with young butterfliers.
